Summary: I saw 2 triangle-shaped, VERY BRIGHT, objects at an unknown distance, but over the roof-level of a full-sized barn. Were gone when I came back w/ a camera.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Napoleon
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was house-sitting for some relatives in a rural vicinity of henry county, ohio. when i went outside to star-gaze, i noted two, extremely bright triangle shaped objects in the sky. i could not tell how far they were, but they were above the roof-level of a full-sized barn. they appeared to be maybe 1\2 mile or farther, but out there, i have no way of telling how far. at first, i was not sure what i was looking at, but i did know there were no fixed lights in that direction. after several minutes (maybe 10?) i decided to see if i could get a picture of them with my kodak easy share, but i was not able to as it was too poor a quality. the pictures turned out like dim blobs [i need to save for a decent telescope and low-light-capable video]! i have no idea how long they were there, but i had to go inside for a moment (nature called). when i got back outside, they were gone. i checked for them again the following night but nothing else was observed.
